meta.title: Age Calculator - Calculate Exact Age in Years, Days [2026]

validation.birthDateInvalid: Please enter a valid birth date
validation.birthDateFuture: Birth date cannot be in the future
validation.birthDateTooOld: Date is too far in the past

disclaimer.text: This calculator provides accurate age calculations based on the dates entered. Results account for leap years and varying month lengths.
disclaimer.note: Age is calculated using the Gregorian calendar. Different cultures may calculate age differently (e.g., some Asian cultures add one year at birth).

seo.whatIsContent: An age calculator determines your exact age from your date of birth to any specified date. Beyond just years, it calculates your age in months, days, hours, and minutes. It also provides your zodiac sign, generation, birth day of the week, and days until your next birthday.
seo.howItWorksContent: The calculator uses the Gregorian calendar system to determine the time elapsed between your birth date and the current date. It accounts for leap years and different month lengths. Generation classification is based on commonly accepted birth year ranges.
seo.feature1: Get your precise age in years, months, and days with leap year accuracy
seo.feature2: View age in different units: years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes
seo.feature3: Automatically determine your zodiac sign based on birth date
seo.feature4: Find your generation: Silent, Boomer, Gen X, Millennial, Gen Z, or Alpha
seo.useCase1: Find exactly how many days until your next birthday or milestone
seo.useCase2: Verify age requirements for legal purposes and contracts
seo.useCase3: Calculate milestones like 10,000 days lived or golden birthdays
seo.useCase4: Accurate patient age documentation for healthcare providers
seo.tip1: Dates before 1582 may vary as Gregorian calendar adoption differed by country
seo.tip2: February 29 birthdays legally age on Feb 28 or March 1 in non-leap years
seo.tip3: Some Asian cultures count age differently (1 year old at birth)
seo.tip4: This calculator uses dates as entered without time zone adjustments
seo.faq1Question: How accurate is this age calculator?
seo.faq1Answer: This calculator is extremely accurate for dates from 1582 onwards. It correctly accounts for leap years, varying month lengths, and all calendar peculiarities.
seo.faq2Question: Why is my age different than I thought?
seo.faq2Answer: You may be confusing your age with your year of life. When you turn 30, you're entering your 31st year. Also, some cultures count age differently - Korean age counts you as 1 at birth.
seo.faq3Question: What if I was born on February 29 (leap day)?
seo.faq3Answer: The calculator will still accurately determine your age. In non-leap years, you legally age on February 28 or March 1 depending on jurisdiction.
seo.faq4Answer: Zodiac signs are determined by sun position at birth according to Western astrology. Each sign corresponds to specific date ranges (Aries: March 21-April 19, etc.).
seo.faq5Answer: Generations by birth year: Silent (1928-1945), Boomers (1946-1964), Gen X (1965-1980), Millennials (1981-1996), Gen Z (1997-2012), Gen Alpha (2013+).
seo.faq6Question: Can I calculate someone else's age?
seo.faq6Answer: Yes, enter any date of birth to calculate age as of today or any specified date. Useful for historical figures, eligibility checks, or pet ages.
seo.faq7Question: How do I calculate age between two specific dates?
seo.faq7Answer: Select a specific 'Calculate Age On' date instead of today to determine age at any point in past or future.
seo.faq8Question: Why does my age in months seem high?
seo.faq8Answer: Age in months is total complete months lived, not years × 12. At 25 years 7 months, you've lived ~307 months total (25×12+7).
seo.howToStep1: Select your date of birth using the date picker
seo.howToStep2: Choose the date to calculate age to (defaults to today)
seo.howToStep3: Click 'Calculate Age' to process the calculation
seo.howToStep4: View your exact age in years, months, and days
seo.howToStep5: Discover zodiac sign, generation, and days until next birthday
